pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lattice Options and Add-Ins // Various plots and functions that make use of the lattice/trellis plotting framework. The plots, which include loaPlot(), GoogleMap() and trianglePlot(), use panelPal(), a function that extends 'lattice' and 'hexbin' package methods to automate plot subscript and panel-to-panel and panel-to-key synchronization/management.
